unit.class: public interface XSNotationDeclaration extends XSObject { /** * The URI reference representing the system identifier for the notation * declaration, if present, null otherwise. */ public String getSystemId (); /** * The string representing the public identifier for this notation * declaration, if present; null otherwise. */ public String getPublicId (); /** * An [annotation] if it exists, otherwise null. */ public XSAnnotation getAnnotation (); }
